name: pictery
description: An image gallery management application developed in Vue and Express.js with Typescript.

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev -w backend" "npm run dev -w frontend"
scripts.build: concurrently "npm run migrate -w backend && npm run build -w backend" "npm run build -w frontend"
scripts.test: npm run test -w backend && concurrently "npm run dev -w frontend" "NODE_ENV=test npm run dev -w backend" "npm run test -w frontend" --kill-others
